project.name: Property tasks
project.description: Contains all the task used to enable and disable the various property sets

target.name: property:cleanse
target.description: Clean out all the active env and stage properties.

target.name: property:cleanse:env
target.description: Deactivates an environment by deleting all it's properties from the main env dir.

target.name: property:cleanse:stage
target.description: Deactivates a stage by deleting all it's properties from the main stage dir.

target.name: property:cleanse:site
target.description: Deactivates a site by deleting all it's properties from the main site dir

target.name: property:activate:site
target.description: Activates a site by copying all it's property files to the main site property dir.

fail.message: No Site specified. Pass site.to.activate as a property.

echo.message: Syncing properties for ${site.to.activate} to active properties.

target.name: property:activate:env
target.description: Activates an environment by copying all it's property files to the main env property dir.

fail.message: No Env specified. Pass env.to.activate as a property.

echo.message: Syncing properties for ${env.to.activate} to active properties.

target.name: property:activate:stage
target.description: Activates a stage by copying all it's property files to the main stage property dir.

fail.message: No Stage specified. Pass stage.to.activate as a property.

echo.message: Syncing properties for ${stage.to.activate} to active properties.
